Name: Pet Chan
About the game: 'Pet Chan' is a desktop pendant, Can be placed anywhere on the computer desktop, Sexy character design, Dynamic character, Change of clothes, Add a layer of sexy to the desktop ! Game Features: 1.Sexy character design 2.Characters contain 6 sexy poses 3.All poses are dynamic 4.Contains 3 character clothes 5.Characters Freely zoom in, zoom out, move 6.Left mouse button can drag characters, Right mouse button to open function menu, Free transform 7.'Pet Chan' is a sexy desktop pendant
